phrases: Long ago, the four nations lived together in harmony.
Then, everything changed when the Fire Nation attacked.
Only the Avatar, master of all four elements, could stop them.
But when the world needed him most, he vanished.
A hundred years passed, and my brother and I discovered the new Avatar...
And although his airbending skills are great.
He has a lot to learn before he is ready to save anyone.
But I believe Aang can save the world.
A couple of more years and you might be ready to fight a sea sponge.
Would anyone care for a rematch with Katara?
Katara, you have advanced more quickly than any student I have ever trained.
You have proven that with fierce determination,...
Raw talent alone is not enough.
Care to step into the sparring circle?
I figure since you have found time to play with house pets...
I would not say mastered, but check this out!
So they do not have palaces in the Southern Tribe?
I grew up in a block of ice.
It is not exactly a cultural hub.
You need to meet my good friend Appa!
Appa and I go way back.
Looks like you have not been giving Appa enough attention.
I cannot believe you do this every day!
Yeh, we pretty much live up here.
Is it always this cold in the sky?
Not when you are with someone.
Right before my village was attacked.
It is soot mixed with snow.
They have closed in on the North Pole.
And from the looks of the stuff...
This will truly be one for the history books, General Iroh.
Just think, centuries from now, people will study the great Admiral Zhao...
You are lucky you are here to see it.
Be careful what you wish for, Admiral.
History is not always kind to its subjects.
I suppose you speak from experience?
But rest assured, this will be nothing like your legendary failure at Ba Sing Se.
I hope not, for your sake.
Tell the Captains to prepare for first strike.
I am working on it, Uncle.
I wish we could just be friends,...
You do not love him, do you?
You do not even seem to like him.
But I do love my people.
I have duties to my father, to my tribe.
I have to do this, goodbye!
The day we have feared for so long has arrived.
The Fire Nation is on our doorstep.
It is with great sadness I call my family here before me,...
But they will never vanish from our hearts.
Now, as we approach the battle for our existence, I call upon the great spirits!
I am going to need volunteers for a dangerous mission.
Many of you will not return.
Come forward to receive my mark if you accept the task.
The stillness before battle is unbearable.
I was not there when the Fire Nation attacked my people.
I am going to make a difference this time.
I will take it from here, boy!
You have got to be kidding me.
Men, you will be infiltrating the Fire Nation navy.
That means you will all need one of these uniforms...
Fire Navy uniforms do not look like that.
These are real uniforms captured from actual Fire Navy soldiers.
When, like a hundred years ago?
The Fire Nation does not wear shoulder spikes anymore.
The newer uniforms are more streamlined.
How do we know we can trust this guy?
Such bold talk for a new recruit.
Sokka is from our sister tribe, Hahn, he is a capable warrior and I value his input.
Now, our first objective is to determine the identity of their commanding officer.
Sokka, I want you to tell everything you know to Hahn, he is leading this mission.
I expect nothing less from my future son-in-law.
As your military consultant I must advise you to halt your attack.
The waterbenders draw their power from the moon and it is nearly full tonight.
You should wait and resume the attack at daybreak.
Oh, I am well aware of the moon problem and I am working on a solution.
But for now, daybreak it is.
I must have taken out a dozen Fire Navy ships,...
If you are fishing for an octopus, my nephew,...
I do not need your wisdom right now, Uncle.
I am sorry, I just nag you because, well, ever since I lost my son...
Uncle, you do not have to say it.
I think of you as my own.
It could save your life out there!
And put your hood up, keep your ears warm!
Let me tell ya, Sokka, I have courted a lot of girls,...
I mean, Yue's nice and everything,...
Yue is wasted on a self absorbed weasel like you!
You are just a simple rube from the Southern Tribe.
What would you know of the political complexities of our life?
You are just a jerk without a soul!
Sokka, you are off the mission.
Everybody listen to what I say and we will take out this Admiral Jo in no time.
They are coming up for air somewhere...
The legends say the moon was the first waterbender.
Our ancestors saw how it pushed and pulled the tides...
I have always noticed my waterbending is stronger at night.
Our strength comes from the Spirit of the Moon,...
Maybe I can find them and get their help!
The Avatar is the bridge between our world and the Spirit World.
Maybe they will give you the wisdom to win this battle!
Or, maybe they will unleash a crazy amazing spirit attack on the Fire Nation!
The only problem is, last time you got to the Spirit World by accident.
How are you going to get there this time?
I have an idea, follow me.
So is this the way to the Spirit World?
No, you will have to get there on your own.
But I can take you to the most spiritual place in the entire North Pole.
I never thought I would miss grass this much!
It is the center of all spiritual energy in our land.
I can feel... something... it is so... tranquil.
Hahn's out there on the top secret mission...
I took you off the mission for selfish reasons.
I have a special task in mind for you.
You want me to scrub the barracks?
I want you to guard my daughter, Princess Yue.
That should not be too hard.
Why is he sitting like that?
He is meditating... trying to cross over into the Spirit World.
Is there any way we can help?
I can hear every word you are saying!
He is crossing into the Spirit World.
He will be fine as long as we do not move his body.
That is his way back to the physical world.
Maybe we should get some help?
I am perfectly capable of protecting him.
Well, are not you a big girl now?
Hand him over, and I will not have to hurt you.
I see you have learned a new trick.
But I did not come this far to lose to you.
You have found a master, have not you?
The Water Tribe can try to resist the inevitable, but their city will fall today.
He took him right out from under me.
